rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
口服糖尿病药物索马鲁肽可对抗小鼠肥胖：人类治疗的游戏规则改变者？该研究表明，口服索马鲁肽（一种主要用于治疗 2 型糖尿病的药物）可有效降低饮食引起的肥胖小鼠的体重和血糖水平。研究结果表明，这种药物可能是一种有前途的肥胖治疗方法，并为未来的研究提供合适的动物模型。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230903/Oral-diabetes-drug-semaglutide-fights-obesity-in-mice-A-game-changer-for- human-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230903/Oral-diabetes-drug-semaglutide-fights-obesity-in-mice-A-game-changer-for- human-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=435ba1a3-7772-43e9-8d72-5b97d147d6c9 Sun, 03 Sep 2023 22:12:00 -0400 Oral diabetes drug semaglutide fights obesity in mice: A game-changer for human treatment?
研究发现提高乳腺癌幸存者药物依从性的方法对于大约 80% 的乳腺癌幸存者来说，治疗并不以手术、放疗和化疗结束。相反，在接下来的五到十年内，医生建议他们服用药物来阻断性激素，性激素会促进肿瘤生长并引发复发。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Study-finds-ways-to-improve-medication-adherence-in-breast-cancer-survivors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Study-finds-ways-to-improve-medication-adherence-in-breast-cancer-survivors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e0c1bd5e-2f24-4cb5-88d9-4c58483fe07f Fri, 01 Sep 2023 23:34:00 -0400 Study finds ways to improve medication adherence in breast cancer survivors
科学家发现肝脏 tPA 在调节胆固醇水平方面的新作用尽管高胆固醇的治疗取得了进展，但心脏病仍然是美国死亡的主要原因。威斯康星医学院 (MCW) 的科学家正在研究一种称为极低密度脂蛋白的胆固醇的作用，他们的发现可能为未来带来新的治疗选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Scientists-discover-new-role-for-liver-tPA-in-regulate-cholesterol-levels.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Scientists-discover-new-role-for-liver-tPA-in-regulate-cholesterol-levels.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=db05586a-89d5-4bc8-a4f8-de7c94cdb4b9 Fri, 01 Sep 2023 23:23:00 -0400 Scientists discover new role for liver tPA in regulating cholesterol levels
密歇根州研究人员获得 NIH 2600 万美元拨款，用于研究环境对儿童健康的影响在 2600 万美元联邦拨款的支持下，密歇根三所大学、一个领先的医疗保健系统和一个国家机构的研究人员将继续开展一项长期研究，了解怀孕期间和幼儿期接触环境因素如何影响一生的健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Michigan-researchers-receive-2426-million-NIH-grant-to-study-environmental-impacts-on-child-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Michigan-researchers-receive-2426-million-NIH-grant-to-study-environmental-impacts-on-child-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b1d77cd2-4acb-44a8-8ff9-0559f3478da6 Fri, 01 Sep 2023 23:20:00 -0400 Michigan researchers receive $26 million NIH grant to study environmental impacts on child health
科学家将前谷仓改造成尖端动物行为实验室来自集体行为高级研究卓越中心 (CASCB) 和马克斯·普朗克动物行为研究所的研究人员将一个前谷仓改造成用于复杂行为分析的尖端技术实验室https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Scientists-convert-former-barn-into-cutting-edge-animal-behavior-lab.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Scientists-convert-former-barn-into-cutting-edge-animal-behavior-lab.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4723e05b-757b-4339-adbb-2717fd297b01 Fri, 01 Sep 2023 23:18:15 -0400
SparkMaster 2：新软件可自动分析钙释放事件加州大学戴维斯分校和牛津大学研究人员团队开发了一种创新工具：SparkMaster 2。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/SparkMaster-2-New-software-automates-analysis-of-calcium-release-events.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/SparkMaster-2-New-software-automates-analysis-of-calcium-release-events.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8a24fc9f-73ce-4bc6-bcc5-c360a988b713 Fri, 01 Sep 2023 23:09:00 -0400 SparkMaster 2: New software automates analysis of calcium release events
科学家使用基于网络的方法对 200 种罕见的免疫系统疾病进行了重新分类CeMM、Max Perutz 实验室和维也纳圣安娜儿童癌症研究所的科学家在罕见免疫系统疾病的研究中取得了重大进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Scientists-reclassify-200-rare-immune-system-disorders-using-network-based-approach.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Scientists-reclassify-200-rare-immune-system-disorders-using-network-based-approach.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=42f50088-5090-46db-9d48-c29fa506253b Fri, 01 Sep 2023 23:01:01 -0400 Scientists reclassify 200 rare immune system disorders using network-based approach
研究揭示了免疫细胞在复杂环境中集体迁移的能力在对抗疾病时，我们的免疫细胞需要快速到达目标。奥地利科学技术研究所 (ISTA) 的研究人员现在发现，免疫细胞会主动生成自己的引导系统，以在复杂的环境中导航。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Study-sheds-light-on-immune-cells-ability-to-collectively-migrate-through-complex-environments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Study-sheds-light-on-immune-cells-ability-to-collectively-migrate-through-complex-environments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c866e9b5-88eb-47d1-97fe-7cf8d593d396 Fri, 01 Sep 2023 20:41:20 -0400 Study sheds light on immune cells' ability to collectively migrate through complex environments
美洲印第安人/阿拉斯加原住民的 COVID-19 结果仍然存在差异2020 年春天，当 COVID-19 大流行席卷新墨西哥州时，来自该州各地的重病患者被送往阿尔伯克基的新墨西哥大学医院，许多人在那里接受重症监护，依靠呼吸机呼吸。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Disparities-in-COVID-19-outcomes-persist-for-American-IndiansAlaska-Natives.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Disparities-in-COVID-19-outcomes-persist-for-American-IndiansAlaska-Natives.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=65e775de-16b3-4a91-835d-fa1563c71737 Fri, 01 Sep 2023 20:26:53 -0400 Disparities in COVID-19 outcomes persist for American Indians/Alaska Natives
黑人仍然承受着与空气污染相关的死亡的最高负担耶鲁大学领导的一项新研究发现，减少细颗粒空气污染带来的健康益处在美国人口中的分配并不均匀。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Black-people-still-experience-highest-burden-of-air-pollution-lated-deaths.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230901/Black-people-still-experience-highest-burden-of-air-pollution-lated-deaths.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=63b840cc-de6b-4eae-98b3-31551c36b1bb Fri, 01 Sep 2023 20:20:47 -0400 Black people still experience highest burden of air pollution-related deaths
